metas.content: hotels, rooms, bookings, bookings, cheap, romantic hotels, offers, discount, deals, lastminute

Novotel London Blackfriars is rated "Fabulous" by our guests. Take a look through our photo library, read reviews from real guests and book now with our Price Guarantee. Weâ€™ll even let you know about secret offers and sales when you sign up to our emails.

metas.name: description
metas.content: Located in London's London City Centre neighbourhood, Novotel London Blackfriars is near a metro station and near the beach. The Strand and Covent Garden Market are worth checking out if shopping is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's popular attractions can visit London Eye and Sky Garden. Check out an event or a game at Stamford Bridge Stadium, and consider making time for ZSL London Zoo, a top attraction not to be missed. Our guests appreciate the hotel's convenience for public transport: Southwark Underground Station is 4 minutes by foot and Blackfriars Underground Station is 8 minutes.

propertyDescription.renovationInfo: This property is closed from 20 March 2020 to 31 May 2020 (dates subject to change).
tagline: 4-star hotel with indoor pool, near Tate Modern

featuredReviews.text: Good place to stay, convenient location. Sadly let down by breakfast which felt like aâ€¦
Nice quiet area, good breakfast, very clean. Close to all tourist areas by tube and aâ€¦

seoReviews.description: Brilliant hotel ,ideally located to most attractions ,will definitely be first choice mext time we are in London.
Always happy with a stay at the Novotel Blackfriars- clean, comfortable, staff always helpful!

seoReviews.summary: Great hotel and facilities but beds were hard
seoReviews.description: The hotel is in a great location, is very clean, the staff are fantastic, restaurant and food is good, facilities like the gym are great but for me I found the bed unformfortable and didn't sleep well over my 2 nights stay. That could just be a personal thing but I found the beds really hard.

hotelSize: This hotel is arranged over 13 floors

additionalInfo.description:
1 Queen Bed

25 square metres m2 room with city and courtyard views


Internet â€“ Free WiFi

Entertainment â€“ 32-inch flat-screen TV with digital channels

Food & Drink â€“ 24-hour room service and minibar

Bathroom â€“ Private bathroom, shower and rainfall showerhead

Practical â€“ Safe, desk and phone; free cots/infant beds available on request

Comfort â€“ Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping

Accessibility â€“ Phone accessibility kit, visual fire alarm, roll-in shower, vibrating pillow alarm, wheelchair accessible and wheelchair-width doorways

Non-Smoking

Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability

miscellaneous.cgsMetaDescription: Located in London's London City Centre neighbourhood, Novotel London Blackfriars is near a metro station and near the beach. The Strand and Covent Garden Market are worth checking out if shopping is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's popular attractions can visit London Eye and Sky Garden. Check out an event or a game at Stamford Bridge Stadium, and consider making time for ZSL London Zoo, a top attraction not to be missed. Our guests appreciate the hotel's convenience for public transport: Southwark Underground Station is 4 minutes by foot and Blackfriars Underground Station is 8 minutes.

propertyLinkedData.propertyDescription: Located in London (London City Centre), Novotel London Blackfriars is within a 10-minute walk of Tate Modern and Royal National Theatre. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in London? This hotel has facilities measuring 2131 square feet (198 square meters), including conference space.
